duties_responsibilities.duty: Steer and refine financial planning models to ensure project profitability.
Propose and validate project pricing in alignment with market trends.
Spearhead calls with high-profile clients to elucidate intricate financial and market insights.
Champion the training and coaching of team members in financial tools.
Collaborate extensively to ensure project timelines and budgets are strictly adhered to.
Seek innovative solutions to foster process optimization and creative enhancements.
Dissect and comprehend the market intricacies of solar energy, battery storage, and electric vehicle charging.
Adhere to all regulatory standards to promote a safe and compliant work environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, or Finance. An advanced degree is an added advantage.
